keyActivities: Furniture design, production, retail, and distribution
keyResources: Store locations, warehouses, supply chain, online platform, and workforce
valueProposition: Affordable, stylish, and functional furniture with a focus on DIY assembly and efficient space utilization
customerRelationships: In-store customer service, online support, and customer-focused policies such as returns and exchanges
channels: Physical stores, online platform, catalogs, and social media
customerSegments: Individuals, families, and businesses looking for affordable and functional furniture and home accessories
structure: Efficient supply chain, cost-effective production, and large-scale retail operations
revenueStreams: Sales of furniture, home accessories, and related services
problem: Furnishing homes and spaces can be expensive and time-consuming
existingAlternatives: Other furniture retailers, local stores, and online marketplaces
solution: Offer affordable, stylish, and functional furniture that is easy to assemble and transport
keyMetrics: Store footfall, online sales, customer satisfaction, and return rates
uniqueSellingProposition: Flat-packed furniture, Scandinavian design, and focus on sustainability
highLevelConcept: Creating a better everyday life for people through well-designed, functional, and affordable home furnishings
unfairAdvantage: Global brand recognition, economies of scale, and efficient supply chain
earlyAdopters: Value-conscious customers, young adults, and small-space dwellers
mobileAdvantages: Browse and shop products, access to IKEA Family membership, and store navigation
camera: AR feature to visualize furniture in customers' homes
appIntegrations: Integration with smart home products and loyalty programs
location: Store locations and personalized in-store experiences
attractUsers: Promotions, advertising, and social media engagement
appSavings: Special deals and discounts for app users
inAppPayments: Secure in-app payments and financing options
peopleAndRoles: Store associates, designers, logistics, marketing, and customer service
commonGoals: Offer affordable and functional furniture to improve customers' lives
personalGoals: Sustain IKEA's growth and reputation as a global leader in home furnishings
purpose: To create a better everyday life for the many people
needsAndExpectations: Customers expect affordable, functional, and stylish furniture
rulesAndActivities: Efficient production, flat-packed design, and focus on customer experience
strengthsAndAssets: Global brand recognition, efficient supply chain, and focus on sustainability
weaknessesAndRisks: Competition from other retailers, changing customer preferences, and reliance on suppliers
buyerPersona: Value-conscious customers, young adults, and families
buyerGoals: Furnish their homes with stylish, functional, and affordable furniture
buyerInitiatives: Searching for affordable and easy-to-assemble furniture
buyingProcess: In-store or online browsing, purchasing, and delivery or pickup
buyTiming: Major life events, seasonal promotions, or as needed
buyerThinking: Thecustomer wants to find furniture that fits their budget, style, and space requirements
buyerChannels: In-store, online platform, catalogs, and social media
whyBuy: IKEA offers a unique blend of affordability, functionality, and design, with a focus on DIY assembly and space-saving solutions
buyerInfluencers: Word of mouth, online reviews, and social media
buyerContent: Customers interact with IKEA through their website, app, social media, catalogs, and in-store experiences
strengths: Strong brand identity, efficient supply chain, and focus on sustainability and affordability
opportunities: Expansion into new markets, adoption of new technologies, and collaboration with designers and partners
weaknesses: Competition from other retailers, potential for supply chain disruptions, and maintaining customer satisfaction
threats: Changing consumer preferences, economic fluctuations, and potential negative impact on the environment
productsAndServices: Furniture, home accessories, kitchen appliances, and related services
gainCreators: Providing customers with affordable, stylish, and functional furniture that is easy to assemble and transport
painRelievers: Offering a wide range of products and styles to fit various budgets and space requirements
gains: Customers can furnish their homes with minimal effort, while saving money and enjoying a better living experience
pains: The challenge of finding affordable, stylish, and functional furniture that meets their needs and preferences
customerJobs: Customers need to furnish their homes and spaces with furniture and accessories that meet their style, budget, and functionality requirements
